content.rendered:
Announcement from the FOSS4G-Asia 2023 Seoul Team:
We are pleased to inform you that the Gold Sponsor for our event is ‘SIIS.’ Thanks to the generous support from ‘SIIS,’ we have even higher expectations for the successful hosting of FOSS4G-Asia 2023. With this sponsorship, we are dedicated to making the event a meaningful gathering, engaging even more members. We once again express our gratitude for your support and interest.
